stepTitle: A piece of zinc at $$20.0\degreeC$$ that weighs $$60.0$$ g is dropped into $$200.0$$ g water at $$100.0\degreeC$$. The specific heat capacity of zinc is $$0.389$$ J K-1 g-1, and that of water near 100°C is $$4.22$$ J K-1 g-1. Calculate the final temperature reached by the zinc and the water.
stepBody: Compute your answer in K to the nearest integer.
